app_brief:
Build an enterprise multilingual support and analytics assistant for a global SaaS.
Features:
- Multilingual translation of incoming emails and chats; normalize tone and correct grammar.
- RAG over ~12 GB of product docs, release notes, API guides; monthly refresh; chunk size ~300–400 tokens.
- Answer generation (chatbot) with long-form response option; summarize replies to bullet points.
- Classify sentiment, topic, and urgency; route high priority to humans.
- Table Q&A / SQL generation over Postgres reporting DB for usage and billing questions.
- Agentic workflows: search docs, query SQL, call calendar/email tools, then draft an action plan for the agent to execute.
- Evaluation & monitoring: toxicity and hallucination checks; cost & latency monitoring; weekly auto-eval.
Constraints:
- Prefer API hosting for inference; allow cloud services for vector DB and orchestration when needed.
- No hard compliance beyond GDPR; availability target 99.9% for agentic paths, 99.0% for rest.
